alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near The Redland to Florida City. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Florida City, Homestead Base, Naranja, Richmond West, Country Walk, Leisure City, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds, West Perrine, Princeton, Homestead Bayfront Park, Richmond Heights, The Hammocks and Palmetto Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
